timeline.bodyText: The DEFAULT_SESSION_FILE should be File in first place, same with config file
timeline.author: deathbeam

replies.bodyText: Oh also you should use ofType
replies.author: deathbeam

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/RuneLite.java b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/RuneLite.java
index dfa36b81e..7b5cbfcb2 100644
--- a/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/RuneLite.java
+++ b/runelite-client/src/main/java/net/runelite/client/RuneLite.java

@@ -181,12 +182,12 @@ public class RuneLite
 		final ArgumentAcceptingOptionSpec<File> sessionfile = parser.accepts("sessionfile", "Use a specified session file")
 			.withRequiredArg()
 			.withValuesConvertedBy(new ConfigFileConverter())
-			.defaultsTo(new File(RUNELITE_DIR, DEFAULT_SESSION_FILE));
+			.defaultsTo(DEFAULT_SESSION_FILE);
 
 		final ArgumentAcceptingOptionSpec<File> configfile = parser.accepts("config", "Use a specified config file")
 			.withRequiredArg()
 			.withValuesConvertedBy(new ConfigFileConverter())
-			.defaultsTo(new File(RUNELITE_DIR, DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE));
+			.defaultsTo(DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE);
 
 		final ArgumentAcceptingOptionSpec<ClientUpdateCheckMode> updateMode = parser
 			.accepts("rs", "Select client type")

timeline.bodyText: I would just remove this completely, as you can use DEFAULT_CONFIG_FILE.getName()
timeline.author: deathbeam
